template_comments.person: User role, e.g., Representante del Instituto
template_comments.group: Group for systems, e.g., Sistema Institucional or Gobierno

mapping_guidelines.usage_note: Map descriptions to System Context DSL elements.

systems.example: If 'web app', create 'app = softwareSystem "CertificadosService"' with tag 'system'.

external_systems.maps_to: softwareSystem in provider-specific group with tags external and provider
external_systems.example: If 'SAT', create 'sat = softwareSystem "SAT"' in group 'Gobierno' with tag 'external sat'.

relationships.example: If 'app generates certificates', create 'user -> app "Solicita certificados"'.
relationships.syntax: Use 'SOURCE -> DESTINATION "VERB DESCRIPTION"'. Description must start with an allowed verb and be distinct from element descriptions.

groups.fallback: Use 'Servicios Externos' for unspecified external systems.

optional_rules.groups: Use provider-specific groups for external systems.
optional_rules.person: Include only if users are mentioned.
optional_rules.systemContext: Include if description specifies a context diagram.

example_mappings.description: Una aplicación web que genera los xml de certificados y títulos al representante de su instituto privado. Se vincula con Amazon Rekognition para datos biométricos, Firebase para la base de datos y backend, el SAT para la firma electrónica y la SEP(MET/MEC) para los lineamientos de los certificados y títulos.

known_issues.description: AI used similar descriptions for elements and relationships.

example.invalid: app = softwareSystem "App" { description "Genera certificados" } user -> app "Genera certificados"
example.corrected: app = softwareSystem "App" { description "Sistema para certificados" } user -> app "Solicita certificados"

known_issues.description: AI used generic group instead of provider-specific.
AI included comments, causing potential parsing errors.

generation_guidelines.pre_validation: Use systemContext template. Apply provider-specific groups and distinct descriptions per mapping_guidelines. Remove all comments (//, #, /*, */) before generation. Check known_issues.

rules.title: Use only workspace block
rules.description: All code must be within a workspace block.
rules.instruction: Start with `workspace "SYSTEM_NAME" {` and end with `}`. Example: `workspace "Certificados Digitales" {`.

rules.title: Include model and views
rules.description: Workspace must have model and views sections.
rules.instruction: Include `model { }` and `views { }`. Example: `model { app = softwareSystem "App" { } } views { systemContext app "SystemContext" { } }`.

examples.dsl: workspace "System" { model { app = softwareSystem "App" { description "App"; tags "system" } } views { systemContext app "SystemContext" { include * } } }

rules.title: Define all elements
rules.description: All used elements (softwareSystem, person) must be defined with identifier and multi-line properties.
rules.correction_strategy: Add definition with generic name and description. Separate properties into lines.

rules.title: Use allowed names
rules.description: Element names must use glossary terms.
rules.instruction: Use terms from allowed_names (e.g., Service, Database) with identifier. Example: `CertificadosService`.
rules.correction_strategy: Replace forbidden names with closest glossary term (e.g., module → Service).

rules.title: Use allowed verbs in relationships
rules.instruction: Use verbs from allowed_verbs in `SOURCE -> DESTINATION "VERB DESCRIPTION"`. Example: `app -> db "Consulta datos"`.
rules.correction_strategy: Replace invalid verbs with closest allowed verb per synonyms.

rules.title: Required provider-specific grouping
rules.description: Systems must be in provider-specific groups for external systems.
rules.instruction: Use `group "NAME" { }` for principal and provider-specific external systems (e.g., 'Gobierno' for SAT). Example: `group "Gobierno" { sat = softwareSystem "SAT" { } }`.
rules.correction_strategy: Move ungrouped systems to provider-specific groups per mapping_guidelines.groups.

examples.dsl: group "Gobierno" { sat = softwareSystem "SAT" { description "SAT"; tags "external sat" } }

examples.error: External system not in provider-specific group

rules.title: Optional systemContext view
rules.description: Include systemContext view if specified, without semicolons.
rules.correction_strategy: Add systemContext if specified, remove semicolons, omit if not needed.

examples.dsl:
views { systemContext app "SystemContext" { include *
            autoLayout lr } }

rules.title: No comments
rules.instruction: Remove `//`, `#`, `/*`, `*/` before generation. Example: ensure no `// Relaciones`.

rules.title: Use exact identifiers
rules.description: References in relationships and views must match defined identifiers.
rules.instruction: Use defined identifiers (e.g., `app`, `user`). Example: `app -> db "Consulta datos"`.
rules.correction_strategy: Replace invalid references with defined identifiers.

examples.dsl: app = softwareSystem "App" { description "App"; tags "system" } user -> app "Consulta datos"

rules.title: Use allowed tags
rules.instruction: Use tags: User, system, external, sat, sep, firebase, amazon. Example: `tags "external sat"`.
rules.correction_strategy: Replace invalid tags with appropriate glossary tag.

rules.title: Use allowed elements
rules.description: Model can only contain person, softwareSystem, group, and relationships.
rules.correction_strategy: Replace invalid elements with correct type.

rules.title: Ensure valid syntax
rules.description: DSL must have valid Structurizr syntax without semicolons.
rules.instruction:
Ensure balanced braces, closed quotes, no invalid characters, no semicolons. Example: `systemContext app "SystemContext" { include *
    autoLayout lr }`.
rules.correction_strategy: Fix braces, quotes, remove invalid characters and semicolons.

examples.dsl:
workspace "System" { model { app = softwareSystem "App" { description "App"; tags "system" } } views { systemContext app "SystemContext" { include *
            autoLayout lr } } }
views { systemContext app "SystemContext" { include *; autoLayout lr } }

rules.title: Include style definitions
rules.description: Views must include styles for all relevant tags.
rules.instruction:
Include `styles` with styles for Person, system, external, sat, sep, firebase, amazon. Properties on separate lines. Example: `element "system" { background #003366
                color white
                shape roundedbox }`.
rules.correction_strategy: Add missing styles from template, separate properties.

rules.title: Consistent formatting
rules.description: DSL must use consistent formatting with multi-line properties.
rules.correction_strategy: Reformat with 4-space indentation, separate properties, remove semicolons.

rules.title: Distinct element and relationship descriptions
rules.description: Relationship descriptions must be distinct from element descriptions and use concise, standardized phrasing.
rules.instruction: Ensure relationship descriptions start with an allowed verb, differ from element descriptions, and are concise. Example: element `Sistema para certificados`, relationship `Solicita certificados`.
rules.correction_strategy: Modify relationship description to use a distinct, concise verb or phrase (e.g., 'Genera certificados' → 'Solicita certificados').

examples.dsl: app = softwareSystem "App" { description "Sistema para certificados"; tags "system" } user -> app "Solicita certificados"
app = softwareSystem "App" { description "Genera certificados"; tags "system" } user -> app "Genera certificados digitales"
examples.error: Relationship description too similar to element description
